Several method cervical ripening , mechanical pharmacological , develop improve Bishop score woman eligible induction labor unfavorable cervix . These method include : misoprostol , dinoprostone , intracervical catheter without extra-amniotic saline infusion , laminaria . Several study investigate optimum cervical ripening agent , review current literature support misoprostol give dose 25 microgram every 4 hour intravaginally efficacious inexpensive regimen maintain safe maternal fetal outcome . Several study show misoprostol significantly short time delivery compare method ripen . In fact , 2003 Cochrane Database Systematic Review , misoprostol show increased cervical ripening effectiveness reduce failure achieve vaginal delivery 12-24 hour . Further , uterine hyper-stimulation tachysystole common misoprostol group , adverse neonatal outcome describe . However , misoprostol show high incidence cesarean section fetal intolerance labor compare cervical ripen method include EASI . Misoprostol much less expensive method include dinoprostone . In fact , one article report average cost per patient misoprostol treatment $ 85 compare $ 606 dinoprostone insert .
